content:
If you grep your BN logs for `RejectedByExecutionEngine` you should be able to see how many invalid blocks you've seen *from any producer*. This is how I found them in the first place.

I think you should be able to grep your VC logs for the same string and see how many invalid blocks were *produced by you*.
